articles.author: Stephen Holder
articles.title: Colts confirm FBI investigating death of former owner Jim Irsay - ESPN
articles.description: The Indianapolis Colts on Thursday acknowledged the existence of an FBI investigation into the death of owner Jim Irsay and the potential involvement of a California doctor who reportedly prescribed him pain pills and ketamine.
